Find Your Fit

Intralox has been the world leader of award-winning, comprehensive conveyance solutions for over 45 years. We invented modular plastic conveyor belting and continue to push past the traditional boundaries.

If you’re interested in joining our team, search our available jobs and apply today.

Common search fields
Reset

Select the position that best matches your interests and background. If you don't see a position at this time, join our Talent Community to stay connected with our latest news.

  • Account Manager - Bakery & Snack (DACH)

    Germany.

    We have an opportunity for an Account Manager, home office based in Germany. Do you thrive in establishing and building long-term B2B customer relationships and you can’t you stop talking about key trends and developments in the food industry world? This job combines both.  What will you be doing? Your focus is on growing revenues with bakery and snack customer accounts that are key industry players in the DACH region (Germany, Austria and Switzerland). You communicate shop floor...
    Apply Share Share Account Manager - Bakery & Snack (DACH) with Facebook Share Account Manager - Bakery & Snack (DACH) with Twitter Share Account Manager - Bakery & Snack (DACH) with Viadeo Share Account Manager - Bakery & Snack (DACH) with Xing Share Account Manager - Bakery & Snack (DACH) with Weibo Share Account Manager - Bakery & Snack (DACH) with a friend via e-mail

  • Account Manager - Bakery/Snack (Pacific Northwest)

    US - Pacific Northwest Region.

    Intralox, L.L.C. has an opening for an Account Manager on its Bakery/Snack Team. As a member of this team, the qualified individual will be responsible for calling on End User accounts at the plant level and corporate level assisting in the development and implementation of strategies at specific accounts with emphasis on multi-plant corporations. This individual will primarily service the Pacific Northwest region of the United States. Ideally, this individual should be located...
    Apply Share Share Account Manager - Bakery/Snack (Pacific Northwest) with Facebook Share Account Manager - Bakery/Snack (Pacific Northwest) with Twitter Share Account Manager - Bakery/Snack (Pacific Northwest) with Viadeo Share Account Manager - Bakery/Snack (Pacific Northwest) with Xing Share Account Manager - Bakery/Snack (Pacific Northwest) with Weibo Share Account Manager - Bakery/Snack (Pacific Northwest) with a friend via e-mail

  • Account Manager - MPS

    US - Southeast Region, US - Southwest Region.

    Intralox, L.L.C. is currently seeking an Account Manager on the Meat Poultry Seafood (Food) Team. As a member of this team, the qualified individual will be responsible for calling on accounts at the corporate, regional, and/or plant level and assisting in the development and implementation of strategies at specific accounts with emphasis on multi-plant corporations. This individual will primarily service the Southeast region.  An average of 3 days per week travel is...
    Apply Share Share Account Manager - MPS with Facebook Share Account Manager - MPS with Twitter Share Account Manager - MPS with Viadeo Share Account Manager - MPS with Xing Share Account Manager - MPS with Weibo Share Account Manager - MPS with a friend via e-mail

  • Account Manager - Warehouse and Distribution Centers

    US - Southeast Region, US - Northeast Region, US - West Coast Region, US - Midwest Region.

    Intralox LLC has an opening for an Account Manager who will be responsible for continued development and growth of our OEM and System Integrator partners in the North American Warehouse and Distribution Industry Segment.    Our patented Activated Roller Belt Solutions have been proven to bring value to Warehouse and Distribution Centers OEMs and System Integrators by reducing overall system costs and/or adding required functionality beyond the capabilities of traditional...
    Apply Share Share Account Manager - Warehouse and Distribution Centers with Facebook Share Account Manager - Warehouse and Distribution Centers with Twitter Share Account Manager - Warehouse and Distribution Centers with Viadeo Share Account Manager - Warehouse and Distribution Centers with Xing Share Account Manager - Warehouse and Distribution Centers with Weibo Share Account Manager - Warehouse and Distribution Centers with a friend via e-mail

  • Account Manager (German speaking)

    Germany.

    We make a difference.For over 40 years, we have helped customers achieve their goals. Our innovative conveyance technology and uncompromising customer commitment have optimized our customers’ productivity around the world. With our revolutionary invention of modular plastic belting, we pushed past the boundaries of traditional conveying systems and we continue to set the standard. Our success is the result of diligent focus on continuous improvement, with mutual trust and...
    Apply Share Share Account Manager (German speaking) with Facebook Share Account Manager (German speaking) with Twitter Share Account Manager (German speaking) with Viadeo Share Account Manager (German speaking) with Xing Share Account Manager (German speaking) with Weibo Share Account Manager (German speaking) with a friend via e-mail

  • Account Manager Meat, Poultry & Seafood - New Zealand

    Auckland, New Zealand.

    Intralox  New Zealand has an opening for an Account Manager on its Meat, Poultry and Seafood Team. As a member of this team, the qualified individual will be responsible for calling on End User accounts at the plant and corporate level assisting in the development and implementation of strategies at specific accounts with emphasis on multi-plant corporations. This position is a national role. Ideally, this individual should be located in the main centres of either Auckland, Christchurch...
    Apply Share Share Account Manager Meat, Poultry & Seafood - New Zealand with Facebook Share Account Manager Meat, Poultry & Seafood - New Zealand with Twitter Share Account Manager Meat, Poultry & Seafood - New Zealand with Viadeo Share Account Manager Meat, Poultry & Seafood - New Zealand with Xing Share Account Manager Meat, Poultry & Seafood - New Zealand with Weibo Share Account Manager Meat, Poultry & Seafood - New Zealand with a friend via e-mail

  • Account Manager Meat, Poultry, Seafood (MPS)

    Spain.

    Are you a talented, self-managed sales professional looking for an opportunity to boost your international experience and develop your potential?In this exciting role, you would be working from a home office base in the North of Spain and managing Intralox’s Meat, Poultry and Seafood business in Portugal and the North of Spain.What will you be doing?Your focus is on growing revenues with customer accounts that are key industry players in Portugal and North of Spain. You communicate shop...

  • Account Manager United Kingdom Fruit, Vegetable, Other Food (FVF)

    United Kingdom.

    We make a difference. For over 40 years, we have helped customers achieve their goals. Our innovative conveyance technology and uncompromising customer commitment have optimized our customers’ productivity around the world. With our revolutionary invention of modular plastic belting, we pushed past the boundaries of traditional conveying systems and we continue to set the standard. Our success is the result of diligent focus on continuous improvement, with mutual trust and self-managed...
    Apply Share Share Account Manager United Kingdom Fruit, Vegetable, Other Food (FVF) with Facebook Share Account Manager United Kingdom Fruit, Vegetable, Other Food (FVF) with Twitter Share Account Manager United Kingdom Fruit, Vegetable, Other Food (FVF) with Viadeo Share Account Manager United Kingdom Fruit, Vegetable, Other Food (FVF) with Xing Share Account Manager United Kingdom Fruit, Vegetable, Other Food (FVF) with Weibo Share Account Manager United Kingdom Fruit, Vegetable, Other Food (FVF) with a friend via e-mail

  • Account Representative

    New Orleans, LA.

    Intralox, L.L.C. has an opening for an inside Account Representative on the Customer Service team. As a member of this team, the qualified individual will be responsible for providing exceptional service support to customers and for managing accounts through reactive and proactive contact, working with an industry-focused team to maintain and grow sales. For more information about Intralox and the great benefits that we offer, click here.
    Apply Share Share Account Representative with Facebook Share Account Representative with Twitter Share Account Representative with Viadeo Share Account Representative with Xing Share Account Representative with Weibo Share Account Representative with a friend via e-mail

  • Account Representative - Spanish Speaker

    New Orleans, LA.

    Intralox, L.L.C. has an opening for an inside Account Representative on our Latin American team. As a member of this team, the qualified individual will be responsible for providing exceptional service support to customers and for managing accounts through reactive and proactive contact, working with an industry-focused team to maintain and grow sales.    Intralox offers an unparalleled opportunity for those who want to work for an established, yet consistently growing company,...
    Apply Share Share Account Representative - Spanish Speaker with Facebook Share Account Representative - Spanish Speaker with Twitter Share Account Representative - Spanish Speaker with Viadeo Share Account Representative - Spanish Speaker with Xing Share Account Representative - Spanish Speaker with Weibo Share Account Representative - Spanish Speaker with a friend via e-mail

  • Account Representative (German Speaking)

    Amsterdam, The Netherlands.

    We make a difference.For over 40 years, we have helped customers achieve their goals. Our innovative conveyance technology and uncompromising customer commitment have optimized our customers’ productivity around the world. With our revolutionary invention of modular plastic belting, we pushed past the boundaries of traditional conveying systems and we continue to set the standard. Our success is the result of diligent focus on continuous improvement, with mutual trust and self-managed...

  • Assembly Technician

    Baltimore/Washington D.C..

    The Intralox, L.L.C. Hanover, MD Development team is looking for an Assembly Technician. The candidate will be mainly responsible for assembly and testing of custom and developmental equipment at our Hanover, MD office. The technician will utilize our production schedule to build equipment and assist engineers in testing and validation. In addition, this role will track incoming parts, develop processes for parts inspection, and ensure high quality product. This is a production environment...
    Apply Share Share Assembly Technician with Facebook Share Assembly Technician with Twitter Share Assembly Technician with Viadeo Share Assembly Technician with Xing Share Assembly Technician with Weibo Share Assembly Technician with a friend via e-mail

  • Business Development Analyst

    Baltimore/Washington D.C..

    Intralox, L.L.C., a division of Laitram, L.L.C., and a global provider of conveyance solutions and services has an opening for a Business Development Analyst (BDA) in North America for the rapidly growing ‘Packer to Palletizer’ platform. This position is key to accelerating the exciting growth path for this platform; and will drive business development strategies in North America with the potential of impacting international markets. The BDA has the opportunity to directly impact business...
    Apply Share Share Business Development Analyst with Facebook Share Business Development Analyst with Twitter Share Business Development Analyst with Viadeo Share Business Development Analyst with Xing Share Business Development Analyst with Weibo Share Business Development Analyst with a friend via e-mail

  • Business Process Engineer

    Baltimore/Washington D.C..

    Intralox, L.L.C., the world leader in conveyor equipment solutions utilizing modular plastic conveyor belts, has a position available for a Business Process Engineer.As a part of the Continuous Improvement Team, this person would work as a subject matter expert in our Equipment business to help with the identification and prioritization of business problems, capture clear business requirements and translate those requirements into solutions.This individual will be responsible for mapping and...
    Apply Share Share Business Process Engineer with Facebook Share Business Process Engineer with Twitter Share Business Process Engineer with Viadeo Share Business Process Engineer with Xing Share Business Process Engineer with Weibo Share Business Process Engineer with a friend via e-mail

  • Controls Engineer - Integration

    Baltimore/Washington D.C..

    Intralox has several openings for Controls Engineers to work on complex and game-changing problems.  We have positions available in multiple parts of our business as it pertains to the postal and parcel industry, logistics and material handling equipment, and field service.  These positions would be responsible for the electrical control system design of our conveyor solutions, programming PLCs, troubleshooting, and/or installations. A wide degree of creativity and latitude is...
    Apply Share Share Controls Engineer - Integration with Facebook Share Controls Engineer - Integration with Twitter Share Controls Engineer - Integration with Viadeo Share Controls Engineer - Integration with Xing Share Controls Engineer - Integration with Weibo Share Controls Engineer - Integration with a friend via e-mail

  • Controls Engineer - Operations

    Baltimore/Washington D.C..

    Intralox has several openings for Controls Engineers to work on complex and game-changing problems.  We have positions available in multiple parts of our business as it pertains to the postal and parcel industry, logistics and material handling equipment, and field service.  These positions would be responsible for the electrical control system design of our conveyor solutions, programming PLCs, troubleshooting, and/or installations. A wide degree of creativity and latitude is...
    Apply Share Share Controls Engineer - Operations with Facebook Share Controls Engineer - Operations with Twitter Share Controls Engineer - Operations with Viadeo Share Controls Engineer - Operations with Xing Share Controls Engineer - Operations with Weibo Share Controls Engineer - Operations with a friend via e-mail

  • Credit and Collections Specialist - Spanish Speaker

    New Orleans, LA.

    Intralox L.L.C. has an opening for a Bilingual Credit and Collections Specialist for our Latin American Credit and Collections Team. Primary responsibilities for this position include verifying and evaluating credit worthiness of customers, setting credit limits and determining credit hold decisions. Additional responsibilities include management of accounts receivable including following-up on past due accounts, resolving issues with customers that are delaying payment, negotiating payment...
    Apply Share Share Credit and Collections Specialist - Spanish Speaker with Facebook Share Credit and Collections Specialist - Spanish Speaker with Twitter Share Credit and Collections Specialist - Spanish Speaker with Viadeo Share Credit and Collections Specialist - Spanish Speaker with Xing Share Credit and Collections Specialist - Spanish Speaker with Weibo Share Credit and Collections Specialist - Spanish Speaker with a friend via e-mail

  • Customer Service Specialist (German speaking)

    Amsterdam, The Netherlands.

    Intralox EMEA has a new opportunity to join our award winning Customer Service Department. We work with self managed people, which means you will be given the freedom to put your own stamp on your everyday work as an Operational Representative (title used internally). Operational RepresentativeAmsterdam | 40 hours pw | German Speaking
    Apply Share Share Customer Service Specialist (German speaking) with Facebook Share Customer Service Specialist (German speaking) with Twitter Share Customer Service Specialist (German speaking) with Viadeo Share Customer Service Specialist (German speaking) with Xing Share Customer Service Specialist (German speaking) with Weibo Share Customer Service Specialist (German speaking) with a friend via e-mail

  • Digital Copywriter

    New Orleans, LA.

    Intralox, the global leader in conveyance solutions, is looking for an experienced individual to fill the role of Marketing Digital Copywriter. Are you a strategic digital copywriter who is passionate about your craft, is endlessly curious, and cares about the details in the content you produce? If so, come join the growing in-house Global Marketing Department at Intralox.As Digital Copywriter, you will translate marketing strategies into engaging copy for multiple channels, with a...
    Apply Share Share Digital Copywriter with Facebook Share Digital Copywriter with Twitter Share Digital Copywriter with Viadeo Share Digital Copywriter with Xing Share Digital Copywriter with Weibo Share Digital Copywriter with a friend via e-mail

  • Digital Workplace Architect (New Orleans or Baltimore)

    New Orleans, LA, Baltimore/Washington D.C..

    We are seeking a Digital Workplace Architect who will develop effective architectures for utilizing and managing endpoints and applications across the enterprise.  The successful candidate will roadmap and design for the consumerization of IT, the shift to Software-as-a-Service (SaaS), and the increased update release cadence of Operating Systems and Applications.  They will have experience in Unified Endpoint Management (UEM) with multiple device types and operating systems.The...
    Apply Share Share Digital Workplace Architect (New Orleans or Baltimore) with Facebook Share Digital Workplace Architect (New Orleans or Baltimore) with Twitter Share Digital Workplace Architect (New Orleans or Baltimore) with Viadeo Share Digital Workplace Architect (New Orleans or Baltimore) with Xing Share Digital Workplace Architect (New Orleans or Baltimore) with Weibo Share Digital Workplace Architect (New Orleans or Baltimore) with a friend via e-mail
